subject: Football
Brain
lead_paragraph: Killed in a car crash three years ago, Justin Strzelczyk  is the fourth former N.F.L. player to have been found post-mortem to have brain damage that experts said was caused by persistent head trauma.
snippet: Killed in a car crash three years ago, Justin Strzelczyk  is the fourth former N.F.L. player to have been found post-mortem to have brain damage that experts said was caused by persistent head trauma.
